properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 3 at 4:59AM AKST until January 3 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow occurring. Expect additional snow accumulations of 1
to 2 inches with locally higher amounts possible this morning.
Two more weak fronts will bring additional accumulations of 4
to 6 inches through late Saturday morning.

* WHERE...Kodiak Island.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST this morning. While snow will diminish
through the morning, two more periods of snow will develop early
this afternoon and then another one will move through
overnight.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions are expected.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snow combined with gusty north to
northeast winds may reduce visibilities to one mile or less at
times.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING
